feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Show screens that are linked to the selected query by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15487
  • Design errors popover by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15477
  • Create tests for the row saved trigger. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15512
  • Fixes 503 errors on /api/global/auth/default/oidc/configs/ using https by @joecks in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15467
  • Allow multiple tenant users to be created for account holders by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15513

New Contributors

  • @joecks made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15467

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.4...3.4.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add tests for the row updated trigger. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15515
  • Bringing back AWS SDK V3 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15324
  • Row deleted trigger tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15514
  • DS+ deletion - fix issue with incorrectly detecting as table by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15518
  • Fix clickoutside on firefox by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15517

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.5...3.4.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove runStep from the codebase. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15516
  • update testimonial for rebranded client by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15538
  • Fix plugin loading in production apps by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15533
  • App action tests by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15535
  • Fixing app export by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15537
  • Cleaning up loop.spec.ts, moved tests from automation.spec.ts to more appropriate places. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15536
  • Correctly types gen-collection-info.ts by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15529
  • Remove typescript from SSR app - fix app preview by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15540
  • New component drag-and-drop improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15497
  • Fix js completions by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15521

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.6...3.4.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump koa from 2.13.4 to 2.15.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15541
  • Revert setting a default icon by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15548
  • Test URL variables in design by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15534
  • Fix S3 datasource upload and read by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15550

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.7...3.4.8

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Removing smithy package by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15551

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.8...3.4.9
